welcoming:
We welcome
our guests in Borsodnádasd in the heart of the Bükk in a beautiful environment, in our apartment with vintage atmosphere. For all those who love nature, hiking or excursions in the mountains, the Nádasdy Apartment House offers relaxation and entertainment after a pleasant and tiring day. You are surrounded by the Mátra and the Bükk National Park, and on Szilvásvárad you just have to pop in for a good trout meal.
